channel.title: PI Interface

item.title: PI Interface
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

	public static void loyaltyShop(RSFont[] rsFonts) {
		RSInterface tab = addTabInterface(18900);
		addSprite(18901, 1, "Interfaces/Classes/BACKGROUND");
		addHover(18902, 1, 0, 19151, 10, "Interfaces/Classes/CHANGE", 65, 32, "Buy");
		addHover(18903, 1, 0, 19151, 12, "Interfaces/Classes/CHANGE", 65, 32, "Buy");
		addHover(18904, 1, 0, 19151, 11, "Interfaces/Classes/CHANGE", 65, 32, "Buy");
		addHover(18905, 3, 0, 19151, 18, "Interfaces/Classes/CLOSE", 16, 16, "Close");
    		addText(19654, "Buy Title : King", rsFonts, 0, 16750623, false, true);
    		addText(19655, "Buy Title : Queen", rsFonts, 0, 16750623, false, true);
    		addText(19656, "Buy Title : Desperado", rsFonts, 0, 16750623, false, true);
    		addText(19567, "Buy Title : Big Cheese", rsFonts, 0, 16750623, false, true);
		tab.totalChildren(10);
		tab.child(0, 18901, 2, 30);
		tab.child(1, 18902, 40, 78);
		tab.child(2, 18903, 192, 78);
		tab.child(3, 18904, 344, 78);
		tab.child(4, 18905, 497, 30);
		tab.child(6, 19654, 2, 30);
		tab.child(7, 19655, 40, 73);
		tab.child(8, 19656, 192, 73);
		tab.child(9, 19567, 344, 73);
		tab.child(10, 19568, 497, 25);
		}

Why does this crash my client?
